programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of day one of the series-concluding Fifth Test, held at Sydney Cricket Ground. programme.desc: We revisit the 2013 Qatar Grand Prix at the Losail International Circuit. After two wretched years in the Ducati team, Valentino Rossi was back to his battling best for Yamaha.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013 Dutch Grand Prix in Assen when Valentino Rossi claimed his first win since 2010 and Cal Crutchlow finished third after starting from pole for the first time.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the incident-packed 2013 British Grand Prix at Silverstone. World champion Jorge Lorenzo ended Marc Marquez's winning streak to take victory after an epic last lap duel.

programme.desc: Coverage of the second heat of the Four Man Bob in Winterberg, Germany.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the thrilling 2010 Spanish Grand Prix at Jerez, featuring a dramatic last-lap battle between Spanish duo and bitter rivals, Dani Pedrosa and Jorge Lorenzo.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the epic 2010 French Grand Prix at Le Mans. Jorge Lorenzo, chasing the first back-to-back win of his career, was locked in a tense title battle with Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2010 Valencia Grand Prix at the Circuit Ricardo Tormo, the final round of the season. Jorge Lorenzo was looking to beat Valentino Rossi's record of 373 points.

programme.title: WRC: More Than Machine
programme.desc: Series following members of the M-Sport WRC team about the trials and tribulations of competing in Rally driving at the highest level.

programme.title: Sara Price - Chasing Dakar
programme.desc: Documentary about off-road racer Sara Price's gritty pursuit of success and personal milestones while competing in the gruelling Dakar Rally.

programme.title: Dakar Rally Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: Stage one from Yanbu.

programme.title: UFC: The Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: The first semi-final fight of the season pits Team Grasso's Ryan Loder of the U.S. against Team Shevchenko's Omran Chaaban of Finland in a middleweight bout.

programme.title: UFC: The Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: Coached by Alexa Grasso and Valentina Shevchenko, this documentary series follows MMA fighters as they train and compete against each other for a contract with the UFC.

programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Emergency response providers put their lives at risk to save others.
A night at an amusement park takes a deadly turn when a roller coaster malfunction leaves lives hanging in the balance; Abby reaches out to Buck; Athena and Hen respond to an unusual home invasion.

Bobby and his team respond to an emergency at a children's birthday party; the crew jumps into action after one of their own is involved in a devastating accident; Athena tries to cope with a tragedy that hits way too close to home.
